Operator.Label: sum
Operator.ToolTipText: adds two Numbers

Operator.Label: difference
Operator.ToolTipText: subtracts lower Number from upper Number

Operator.Label: product
Operator.ToolTipText: multiplies two Numbers

Operator.Label: quotient
Operator.ToolTipText: divides upper Number by lower Number

Operator.Label: inverse
Operator.ToolTipText: replaces x with -x

Operator.Label: absval
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the absolute value of the Number

Operator.Label: bigger
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the bigger of two Numbers

Operator.Label: smaller
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the smaller of two Numbers

Operator.Label: AND
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the logical AND of two booleans

Operator.Label: AND3
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the logical AND of three booleans

Operator.Label: AND4
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the logical AND of four booleans

Operator.Label: OR
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the logical OR of two booleans

Operator.Label: OR3
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the logical OR of three booleans

Operator.Label: OR4
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the logical OR of four booleans

Operator.Label: EOR
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the logical EOR of two booleans

Operator.Label: NOT
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the logical inverse of a boolean

Operator.Label: AreSameActor
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two Actors are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameStage
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two Stages are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameProp
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two Props are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameVerb
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two Verbs are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameEvent
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two Events are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameNumber
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two Numbers are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameBNumber
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two BNumbers are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two ActorTraits are the same

Operator.Label: AreSamePropTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two PropTraits are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameStageTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two StageTraits are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameMoodTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two MoodTraits are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameQuantifier
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two Quantifiers are the same

Operator.Label: AreSameCertainty
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if its two Certaintys are the same

Operator.Label: TopGreaterThanBottom(BNumber)
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the upper BNumber is greater than the lower BNumber

Operator.Label: TopLessThanBottom(BNumber)
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the upper BNumber is less than the lower BNumber

Operator.Label: TopGreaterThanBottom(Number)
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the upper Number is greater than the lower Number

Operator.Label: TopLessThanBottom(Number)
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the upper Number is less than the lower Number

Operator.Label: ReactingActorIsAWitness
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the ReactingActor is witnessing the Event as it happens

Operator.Label: ReactingActorIsInvolved
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the ReactingActor is in any Socket in this Event

Operator.Label: ?Actor?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an Actor here

Operator.Label: ?Stage?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a Stage here

Operator.Label: ?Prop?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a Prop here

Operator.Label: ?Verb?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a Verb here

Operator.Label: ?Event?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an Event here

Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a BNumber here

Operator.Label: ?Number?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a Number here

Operator.Label: ?Text?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a Text here

Operator.Label: ?Boolean?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a Boolean here

Operator.Label: ?ActorTrait?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an ActorTrait here

Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a PropTrait here

Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a StageTrait here

Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a MoodTrait here

Operator.Label: ?Quantifier?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a Quantifier here

Operator.Label: ?Certainty?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an Certainty here

Operator.Label: ?ActorGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an ActorGroup here

Operator.Label: ?StageGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a StageGroup here

Operator.Label: ?PropGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a PropGroup here

Operator.Label: ?VerbGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an VerbGroup here

Operator.Label: ?ActorTraitGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an ActorTraitGroup here

Operator.Label: ?StageTraitGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in a StageTraitGroup here

Operator.Label: ?PropTraitGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an PropTraitGroup here

Operator.Label: ?MoodTraitGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an MoodTraitGroup here

Operator.Label: ?QuantifierGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an QuantifierGroup here

Operator.Label: ?CertaintyGroup?
Operator.ToolTipText: You must fill in an CertaintyGroup here

Operator.Label: ActorConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific Actor

Operator.Label: StageConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific Stage

Operator.Label: PropConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific Prop

Operator.Label: VerbConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific Verb

Operator.Label: NumberConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific Number

Operator.Label: QuantifierConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific Quantifier

Operator.Label: CertaintyConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific Certainty

Operator.Label: BNumberConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific BNumber

Operator.Label: TextConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific Text

Operator.Label: ActorTraitConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific ActorTrait

Operator.Label: MoodTraitConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific MoodTrait

Operator.Label: PropTraitConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific PropTrait

Operator.Label: StageTraitConstant
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a specific StageTrait

Operator.Label: Concat
Operator.ToolTipText: sticks the lower text onto the end of the upper text

Operator.Label: Concat3
Operator.ToolTipText: creates a new text that is First Text followed by Second Text followed by Third Text

Operator.Label: Concat4
Operator.ToolTipText: creates a new text that is First Text followed by Second Text followed by Third Text followed by the Fourth Text

Operator.Label: NominativePronoun
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the nominative pronoun appropriate to the person of this WordSocket: I, you, he, or she.

Operator.Label: GenitivePronoun
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the genitive pronoun appropriate to the person of this WordSocket: my, your, his, her

Operator.Label: AccusativePronoun
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the accusative pronoun appropriate to the person of this WordSocket: me, you, him, her

Operator.Label: ReflexivePronoun
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the reflexive pronoun appropriate to the person of this WordSocket: myself, yourself, himself, herself

Operator.Label: ConjugatedVerb
Operator.ToolTipText: appends an 's' to the argument when the Subject is not the ReactingActor

Operator.Label: TheName
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the name that you assigned to this Actor, Prop, or Stage

Operator.Label: PickUpperTextIf
Operator.ToolTipText: if the Deciding Factor is true, then this produces the upper custom text; otherwise, it produces the lower custom text.

Operator.Label: IfSubjectIsNotProtagonist
Operator.ToolTipText: if the Subject is the Protagonist, then this produces the standard text (TheName); if the Subject is not the Protagonist, then this produces the custom text you provide here.

Operator.Label: IfSubjectIsReactingActor
Operator.ToolTipText: if the Subject is the ReactingActor, then this produces the upper text; if the Subject is not the ReactingActor, then this produces the lower text.

Operator.Label: CalculatedText3
Operator.ToolTipText: chooses the text based on the BNumber value

Operator.Label: CalculatedText5
Operator.ToolTipText: chooses the text based on the BNumber value

Operator.Label: CalculatedText7
Operator.ToolTipText: chooses the text based on the BNumber value

Operator.Label: CalculatedText9
Operator.ToolTipText: chooses the text based on the BNumber value

Operator.Label: CalculatedText11
Operator.ToolTipText: chooses the text based on the BNumber value

Operator.Label: VisibleActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: Tells if the given actor trait is visible.

Operator.Label: ReactingActor
Operator.ToolTipText: the Actor assuming this Role

Operator.Label: StoryMinute
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the count of Minutes in the current Hour

Operator.Label: StoryHour
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the count of Hours in the current Day

Operator.Label: StoryDay
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the count of Days since the storyworld began

Operator.Label: StoryTime
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the count of Minutes since the storyworld began

Operator.Label: EventCount
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the count of Events that have taken place so far

Operator.Label: StoryIsOver
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the boolean value of StoryOver

Operator.Label: SetStoryIsOver
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the boolean value of StoryOver to true or false

Operator.Label: StartEpilogue
Operator.ToolTipText: starts the Epilogue

Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Unconscious value for an Actor

Operator.ToolTipText: sets the Unconscious value for an Actor

Operator.Label: ActorLocation
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Location value for an Actor

Operator.Label: SetActorLocation
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the Location value for an Actor

Operator.Label: TargetStage
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the TargetStage value for an Actor

Operator.Label: SetTargetStage
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the TargetStage value for an Actor

Operator.Label: OccupiedUntil
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the OccupiedUntil value for an Actor

Operator.Label: Sad_Happy
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Sad_Happy mood value for an Actor

Operator.Label: Fearful_Angry
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Fearful_Angry mood value for an Actor

Operator.Label: Suspicious_Gullible
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Suspicious_Gullible mood value for an Actor

Operator.Label: CorrespondingPWeight
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the CorrespondingPWeight of the first Actor for the second Actor

Operator.Label: Kinship
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the symmetric Kinship value between two actors

Operator.Label: SetKinship
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the symmetric Kinship value between two actors. This is automatically written to both parties.

Operator.Label: Debt_Grace
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Debt_Grace value between two actors

Operator.Label: AdjustDebt_Grace
Operator.ToolTipText: adjusts the Debt_Grace value from Debtor to Creditor.

Operator.Label: Carried
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Carried value of a Prop

Operator.Label: SetCarried
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the Carried value of a Prop

Operator.Label: Visible
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Visible value of a Prop

Operator.Label: SetVisible
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the Visible value of a Prop

Operator.Label: InPlay
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the InPlay value of a Prop

Operator.Label: SetInPlay
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the InPlay value of a Prop

Operator.Label: Owner
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Owner value of a Prop

Operator.Label: SetOwner
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the Owner value of a Prop

Operator.Label: PropLocation
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Location value of a Prop

Operator.Label: SetLocation
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the Location value of a Prop

Operator.Label: ActorsOnStage
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the count of Actors on a Stage

Operator.Label: StageOwner
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Actor who owns a Stage

Operator.Label: XCoord
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the X coordinate of a Stage

Operator.Label: SetXCoord
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the X coordinate of a Stage

Operator.Label: YCoord
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Y coordinate of a Stage

Operator.Label: SetYCoord
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the Y coordinate of a Stage

Operator.Label: Unwelcoming_Homey
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Unwelcoming_Homey value of an Actor for a Stage

Operator.Label: SetUnwelcoming_Homey
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the Unwelcoming_Homey value of an Actor for a Stage

Operator.Label: DoorOpen
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the DoorOpen value of a Stage

Operator.Label: SetDoorOpen
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the DoorOpen value for a Stage

Operator.Label: TimeToPrepare
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the TimeToPrepare value of a Verb

Operator.Label: TimeToExecute
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the TimeToExecute value of a Verb

Operator.Label: Trivial_Momentous
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Import value of a Verb

Operator.Label: TotalActors
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the total count of Actors in a storyworld

Operator.Label: TotalStages
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the total count of Stages in a storyworld

Operator.Label: TotalProps
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the total count of Props in a storyworld

Operator.Label: TotalVerbs
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the total count of Verbs in a storyworld

Operator.Label: true
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true

Operator.Label: false
Operator.ToolTipText: produces false

Operator.Label: EventHappened
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the specified Event has happened

Operator.Label: CausalEventHappened
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the specified Event happened

Operator.Label: LookUpEvent
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the PageNumber of the specified Event

Operator.Label: LookUpCausalEvent
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the PageNumber of the specified Event

Operator.Label: CountEvents
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the count of Events that match the specification

Operator.Label: CountCausalEvents
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the count of Events that match the specification

Operator.Label: AdjustPActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: adjusts ReactingActor's value corresponding to mentioned ActorTrait for TowardsWhom

Operator.Label: AdjustSad_Happy
Operator.ToolTipText: adjusts ReactingActor's Sad_Happy mood

Operator.Label: AdjustFearful_Angry
Operator.ToolTipText: adjusts ReactingActor's Fearful_Angry mood

Operator.Label: AdjustSuspicious_Gullible
Operator.ToolTipText: adjusts ReactingActor's Suspicious_Gullible mood

Operator.Label: CreateClockAlarm
Operator.ToolTipText: sets an Alarm to trigger at a specified time, for a specified Actor

Operator.Label: createMeetingAlarm
Operator.ToolTipText: sets an Alarm to trigger when two Actors meet

Operator.Label: CreateStageAlarm
Operator.ToolTipText: sets an Alarm to trigger when an Actor enters a Stage

Operator.Label: CreatePropAlarm
Operator.ToolTipText: sets an Alarm to trigger when an Actor encounters a Prop

Operator.Label: PickBestActor
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the Actor who best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestStage
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the Stage that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestProp
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the Prop that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestVerb
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the Verb that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestEvent
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the Event that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the ActorTrait that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestPropTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the PropTrait that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestStageTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the StageTrait that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestMoodTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the MoodTrait that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestQuantifier
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the Quantifier that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: PickBestCertainty
Operator.ToolTipText: picks the Certainty that best meets the specifications

Operator.Label: CandidateActor
Operator.ToolTipText: the Actor variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateStage
Operator.ToolTipText: the Stage variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateProp
Operator.ToolTipText: the Prop variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateVerb
Operator.ToolTipText: the Verb variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateEvent
Operator.ToolTipText: the Event variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: the ActorTrait variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidatePropTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: the PropTrait variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateStageTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: the StageTrait variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateMoodTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: the MoodTrait variable used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateQuantifier
Operator.ToolTipText: the Quantifier used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: CandidateCertainty
Operator.ToolTipText: the Certainty used in implicit loops

Operator.Label: QuantifierIsInterrogative
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the Quantifier is interrogative

Operator.Label: CertaintyIsInterrogative
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the Certainty is interrogative

Operator.Label: CorrespondingActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the value associated with the ActorTrait

Operator.Label: SetCorrespondingActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: stores the value associated with the ActorTrait

Operator.Label: CorrespondingPActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the P value associated with the ActorTrait

Operator.Label: P3
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the P3 value of

Operator.Label: SetCorrespondingPActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: stores the P value associated with the ActorTrait

Operator.Label: CorrespondingUActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the U value associated with the ActorTrait

Operator.Label: SetCorrespondingUActorTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: stores the P value associated with the ActorTrait

Operator.Label: CorrespondingWeight
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Weight associated with the ActorTrait

Operator.Label: CorrespondingPropTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the value associated with the PropTrait

Operator.Label: CorrespondingStageTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the value associated with the StageTrait

Operator.Label: CorrespondingMoodTrait
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the value associated with the MoodTrait

Operator.Label: Quantifier2BNumber
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BNumber representing the value of the adjective

Operator.Label: Certainty2BNumber
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BNumber representing the value of the adjective

Operator.Label: Quantifier2Number
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Number representing the value of the quantifier as a real number

Operator.Label: Certainty2Number
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Number representing the value of the Certainty as a real number

Operator.Label: BNumber2Quantifier
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Quantifier closest representing the value of the BNumber

Operator.Label: BNumber2Certainty
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the Certainty closest representing the value of the BNumber

Operator.Label: Blend
Operator.ToolTipText: blends two numbers together by bias factor. Zero gives even balance; positive favors the lower term; negative favors the upper term.

Operator.Label: Blend3
Operator.ToolTipText: blends three numbers together by their respective weighting factors. Auto-scales the weighting factors; only their relative values matter.

Operator.Label: Blend4
Operator.ToolTipText: blends four numbers together by their respective weighting factors. Auto-scales the weighting factors; only their relative values matter.

Operator.Label: BlendBothily
Operator.ToolTipText: "Bothily" blends two numbers together by bias factor. Zero gives even balance; positive favors the upper term; negative favors the lower term. "Bothily" means that both numbers have to be big in order to produce a big result.

Operator.Label: BSum
Operator.ToolTipText: Bsum of two BNumbers

Operator.Label: BSum3
Operator.ToolTipText: Bsum of three BNumbers

Operator.Label: BSum4
Operator.ToolTipText: Bsum of four BNumbers

Operator.Label: BDifference
Operator.ToolTipText: Bdifference of two BNumbers

Operator.Label: BProduct
Operator.ToolTipText: Bproduct of two BNumbers

Operator.Label: BQuotient
Operator.ToolTipText: bounded division of upper BNumber by lower BNumber

Operator.Label: MixedQuotient
Operator.ToolTipText: conventional division of upper BNumber by lower Number

Operator.Label: Number2BNumber
Operator.ToolTipText: transforms an Number to its corresponding BNumber

Operator.Label: BNumber2Number
Operator.ToolTipText: transforms a BNumber to its closest corresponding Number

Operator.Label: BAbsval
Operator.ToolTipText: bounded absolute value of a BNumber

Operator.Label: BInverse
Operator.ToolTipText: bounded inverse of a BNumber

Operator.Label: BBigger
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the bigger of two BNumbers

Operator.Label: BSmaller
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the smaller of two BNumbers

Operator.Label: KnowsActor
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the first Actor knows the second Actor

Operator.Label: KnowsProp
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the Actor knows about the Prop

Operator.Label: SetKnowsActor
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the value of KnowsActor to either true or false

Operator.Label: SetKnowsProp
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the value of KnowsProp to either true or false

Operator.Label: KnowsStage
Operator.ToolTipText: produces true if the Actor knows about the Stage

Operator.Label: SetKnowsStage
Operator.ToolTipText: sets the value of KnowsStage to either true or false

Operator.Label: BNumber2UNumber
Operator.ToolTipText: converts a BNumber (-1 to +1) to a UNumber (0 to 1) by smooshing it in

Operator.Label: UNumber2BNumber
Operator.ToolTipText: converts a UNumber (0 to +1) to a BNumber (-1 to 1) by stretching it out

Operator.Label: Random
Operator.ToolTipText: yields a uniformly distributed BNumber

Operator.Label: BRandom
Operator.ToolTipText: yields a B-distributed BNumber

Operator.Label: Boolean2Number
Operator.ToolTipText: converts a Boolean (true or false) to an Number (1 or 0)

Operator.Label: PermitFateToReact
Operator.ToolTipText: Allows Fate to assume the Role. Normally Fate is blocked from assuming any Role.

Operator.Label: FatesRole
Operator.ToolTipText: Forces Fate and only Fate to play this Role. Use only in AssumeRoleIf Scripts!

Operator.Label: MainClauseIs
Operator.ToolTipText: returns true if CandidateEvent has this Subject, Verb, and DirObject

Operator.Label: ElapsedTimeSince
Operator.ToolTipText: returns elapsed time since the most recent CandidateEvent meeting the boolean specification

Operator.Label: FillVerbActorBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the VerbActor Box

Operator.Label: VerbActorBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the VerbActor Box

Operator.Label: FillVerbPropBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the VerbProp Box

Operator.Label: VerbPropBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the VerbProp Box

Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the VerbStage Box

Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the VerbVerb Box

Operator.Label: VerbEventBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the VerbEvent Box

Operator.Label: FillVerbBNumberBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the VerbBNumber Box

Operator.Label: VerbBNumberBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the VerbBNumber Box

Operator.Label: FillRoleActorBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the RoleActor Box

Operator.Label: RoleActorBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the RoleActor Box

Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the RoleProp Box

Operator.Label: RolePropBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the RoleProp Box

Operator.Label: FillRoleStageBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the RoleStage Box

Operator.Label: RoleStageBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the RoleStage Box

Operator.Label: FillRoleVerbBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the RoleVerb Box

Operator.Label: RoleVerbBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the RoleVerb Box

Operator.Label: FillRoleEventBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the RoleEvent Box

Operator.Label: RoleEventBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the RoleEvent Box

Operator.Label: FillRoleBNumberBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the RoleBNumber Box

Operator.Label: RoleBNumberBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the RoleBNumber Box

Operator.Label: FillGlobalActorBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the GlobalActorBox

Operator.Label: GlobalActorBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the GlobalActorBox

Operator.Label: FillGlobalPropBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the GlobalProp Box

Operator.Label: GlobalPropBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the GlobalProp Box

Operator.Label: FillGlobalStageBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the GlobalStage Box

Operator.Label: GlobalStageBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the GlobalStage Box

Operator.Label: FillGlobalVerbBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the GlobalVerb Box

Operator.Label: GlobalVerbBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the GlobalVerb Box

Operator.Label: FillGlobalEventBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the GlobalEvent Box

Operator.Label: GlobalEventBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the GlobalEvent Box

Operator.Label: FillGlobalBNumberBox
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the GlobalBNumber Box

Operator.Label: GlobalBNumberBox
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the GlobalBNumber Box

Operator.Label: SetScore
Operator.ToolTipText: stores its argument into the GlobalBNumber Box

Operator.Label: Score
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the contents of the Score

Operator.Label: IHaventDoneThisBefore
Operator.ToolTipText: returns true if ReactingActor has not performed this Verb with these ChosenSockets before

Operator.Label: IHaventDoneThisSince
Operator.ToolTipText: returns true if ReactingActor has not performed this Verb with these ChosenSockets in the period specified

Operator.Label: PickUpperIf
Operator.ToolTipText: if the switch value is true, this produces the upper value; otherwise it produces the lower value

Operator.Label: Suitability
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a big number for the Quantifier that best fits the Criterion value, and a small number for the Quantifier that worst fits the Criterion value

Operator.Label: CertaintySuitability
Operator.ToolTipText: produces a big number for the Quantifier that best fits the Criterion value, and a small number for the Quantifier that worst fits the Criterion value

Operator.Label: Maxi
Operator.ToolTipText: returns +0.9999

Operator.Label: Mini
Operator.ToolTipText: returns -0.9999

Operator.Label: Actor@Sum
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BSum of all the individual values (second argument) of Acceptable Actors (first argument). Remember to use CandidateActor.

Operator.Label: Actor@Average
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BSum of all the individual values (second argument) of Acceptable Actors (first argument). Remember to use CandidateActor.

Operator.Label: Actor@Tally
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the tally of Acceptable Actors. Remember to use CandidateActor.

Operator.Label: Prop@Sum
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BSum of all the individual values (second argument) of Acceptable Props (first argument). Remember to use CandidateProp.

Operator.Label: Prop@Average
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BSum of all the individual values (second argument) of Acceptable Props (first argument). Remember to use CandidateProp.

Operator.Label: Prop@Tally
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the tally of Acceptable Props. Remember to use CandidateProp.

Operator.Label: Stage@Sum
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BSum of all the individual values (second argument) of Acceptable Stages (first argument). Remember to use CandidateStage.

Operator.Label: Stage@Average
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BSum of all the individual values (second argument) of Acceptable Stages (first argument). Remember to use CandidateStage.

Operator.Label: Stage@Tally
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the tally of Acceptable Stages. Remember to use CandidateStage.

Operator.Label: Event@Sum
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BSum of all the individual values (second argument) of Acceptable Events (first argument). Remember to use CandidateEvent.

Operator.Label: Event@Average
Operator.ToolTipText: produces the BSum of all the individual values (second argument) of Acceptable Events (first argument). Remember to use CandidateEvent.

Operator.Label: SameAsThisOne
Operator.ToolTipText: returns TRUE if the Candidate is the same as the value in this WordSocket of ThisEvent.

Operator.Label: IsAMemberOf9Set
Operator.ToolTipText: returns TRUE if the CandidateQuantifier is a member of the defined set.

Operator.Label: IsAMemberOf7Set
Operator.ToolTipText: returns TRUE if the CandidateQuantifier is a member of the defined set.

Operator.Label: IsAMemberOf5Set
Operator.ToolTipText: returns TRUE if the CandidateQuantifier is a member of the defined set.

Operator.Label: IsAMemberOf3Set
Operator.ToolTipText: returns TRUE if the CandidateQuantifier is a member of the defined set.

Operator.Label: SetUpAuraCounts
Operator.ToolTipText: for Siboot only; randomly initializes aura counts.

Operator.Label: RefreshPAuraCounts
Operator.ToolTipText: for Siboot only; randomly refreshes aura counts.

Operator.Label: Likelihood
Operator.ToolTipText: determines the likelihood that the second mean matches the first mean

Operator.Label: adjustP3
Operator.ToolTipText: Adjusts FirstPerson's P3 value of ThirdPerson for FirstPerson's ReportedTrait closer to ReportedValue

Operator.Label: SetUpPValues
Operator.ToolTipText: initialization of the game.

Operator.Label: NextActor
Operator.ToolTipText: returns the next actor in the sequence
